item.title: ðŸ”´ 15:32 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Chervonohryhorivsk territorial community. Go to shelter!
item.description: ðŸ”´ 15:32 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Chervonohryhorivsk territorial community. Go to shelter! #Chervonohryhorivsk_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
